title: When i type in chat in game my frames drop to almost 0 HELP!
body:
Every time i connect to a game and try to type in regular chat or all chat, my frames drop to 0 and i can hardly see anything but what my clean froze on. This also occurs sometimes if i pan off of my champ into a team fight or when I'm dead trying to watch a team fight.
Any tips? I've tried rebuilding the client but it only said hacking for corruption for like 30 minutes and then restarted. HELP.

replies.body: that would make sense if this were happening since  the beggining of me playing but it doesn't make sense that it only happens when i die, only started a few days ago when I've been playing for a year or that even if I'm at spawn and i start typing i drop frames to 0

If your FPS drops during team fights, it sounds like your pc is having a hard time dealing with everything that's happening at the same time, possibly due to an out of date driver. Go over the steps in our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can smooth out those frames.
